thread.title: Volunteer and join the team of 'Super Sleuths'
thread.title_full: Volunteer and join the team of 'Super Sleuths'

author: Zann's Place - Zann Nelson
title: Volunteer and join the team of 'Super Sleuths'
text:
Contributed Volunteer and join the team of 'Super Sleuths' The Culpeper County Library and History Quest (HQ) have teamed up once again to bring another exciting project to the Culpeper community. Susan Keller of the library and Zann Nelson of HQ invite all interested persons to participate in the Freedman’s Bureau Project. Posted: Wednesday, October 21, 2015 8:07 pm Volunteer and join the team of 'Super Sleuths' Zann's Place - Zann Nelson The Daily Progress The Culpeper County Library and History Quest (HQ) have teamed up once again to bring another exciting project to the Culpeper community. Susan Keller of the library and Zann Nelson of HQ invite all interested persons to participate in the Freedman’s Bureau Project. Requirements include an inquiring mind, a computer or computer skills (you can use one of the library’s computers) and a few hours a week — for as many weeks as you can spare. You do not have to live in Culpeper and you can work from home. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety. You need an online service to view this article in its entirety. Have an online subscription? Haven’t signed up for All Access yet?
